wikipedia_page.main: Alexander Thomas Thomson (born 30 October 1993) is an English cricketer. He made his debut for Warwickshire in the 2017 County Championship on 19 September 2017. He made his List A debut for Warwickshire against the West Indies A team in a tri-series warm-up match on 17 June 2018. He made his Twenty20 debut for Warwickshire in the 2018 t20 Blast on 10 August 2018.
